items.title: Why this blog exists?
items.content_text: Well, some of my today’s work has inspired by Lucas Kostka.  Purchase a cheap domain  Find a blog theme - All the credit goes to Ronalds Vilciņš  Google “reason for blogging” - landed on this long post which I am not likely to read through  Write this first mumbo jumbo  Put it up on the internet as fast as I could
items.content_html:
Well, some of my today’s work has inspired by Lucas Kostka.

  • Purchase a cheap domain
  • Find a blog theme - All the credit goes to Ronalds Vilciņš
  • Google “reason for blogging” - landed on this long post which I am not likely to read through
  • Write this first mumbo jumbo
  • Put it up on the internet as fast as I could
